name: InfluenzaTestsForUnspecifiedInfluenzaVirusByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Influenza (Tests for unspecified influenza virus by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes for lab test names to detect unspecified Influenza in a culture),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: unspecified Influenza virus culture/isolate),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
